insights.text: Total income showed a growth from 3507.0 in Q4 2023 to 5657.0 in Q4 2024, indicating a significant increase in revenue.
The sequential growth in total income from 5020.0 in Q3 2024 to 5657.0 in Q4 2024 demonstrates positive revenue momentum.
Net profit increased from 138.0 in Q4 2023 to 59.0 in Q4 2024, showing a positive trend, although the margin is lower.
The sequential growth in net profit from 176.0 in Q3 2024 to 59.0 in Q4 2024 is negative, requiring further investigation.
Earnings per share (EPS) showed a growth from 0.16 in Q4 2023 to 0.07 in Q4 2024, but the margin is much lower.
The sequential EPS growth from 0.21 in Q3 2024 to 0.07 in Q4 2024 is a significant decline.
India food ordering and delivery segment consistently demonstrates strong profitability across all quarters, with a high net profit percentage.
The Hyperpure segment shows inconsistent performance, fluctuating between losses and negligible profits; requiring strategic review.
